hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# hoards #Din's Fire#.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Statue Room Northeast Chest

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Heart Container#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that a #tent in the valley# covers #Man in Green's House#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #outside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Serenade of Water#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #the Tower#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that Twinrova always casts the same spell the first three times.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #Malon's obstacle course# leads to #the Ice Arrows#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #the Shadow Temple#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #the Lens of Truth# and #a Strength Upgrade#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: Oh!^Oh-oh!^C'mon!^Come on! Come on! Come on!^HOT!!^What a hot beat!^WHOOOOAH!^YEEEEAH!^YAHOOO!!
